reviews.text:
ordered via Grab app, and recieved those bread in this kind of condition??? Stickers were being changed before and it's very obvious it's overnight bread!! Not fresh and tried to paste new stickers to cover??? At least u tear and paste properly la walao. This kind of tear and paste Also can see you deliberately change sticker  ... Oh my god. And donut confirm Also put very long already, sticker still never tear clean.. ðŸ™„ðŸ™„ðŸ™„ Not honest At all!!!!! If All these Items ate by my parents and grandparents, anything happens i will sue you all.
If want to be in fnb line, please At least have conscience!!!
Love the waffle here! Bought twice and Always asked the lady staff to make it crispy and she did a good job. Generous amount of chocolate as well. Best to eat while its still hot

I ordered a few items, including Butter Cream Cakes and Swiss Rolls, from this store (Punggol branch) through foodpanda today. They were very dry and I could taste that they were close to expired or even perhaps, already past their expiry dates.

The expiry date stickers on the boxes were deliberately torn off (I could still see a small bit of the sticker left on one of the Butter Cream Cake boxes), which I think is dishonest.

Please take extra care when purchasing from this store, especially if through a food delivery platform.
An *dishonest*  bakery shop selling stale kaya bread . Expiry date is a few days . Buy and next day kaya bread turn sourish and with grim! Buy at your own risk

Hard and Heart work
Miss Christine from Bread Junction (Punggol) attended to my order for CNY goodies professionally and efficiently. She went beyond her call of duty and followed through to ensure that order was delivered on time. I was very touched when she messaged me to check whether the goodies were delivered. I found her hard working and passionate in her work. Thanks so much Miss Christine. You will make a good manager!
